mapper.select: select * from t_admin where account = #{account} and pwd=#{pwd} limit 1;

select a.account,a.time,p.name from t_admin a,t_params p where a.roleid=p.value and p.type='worker'
and TO_DAYS(time)>= TO_DAYS(#{time1})
and TO_DAYS(time)<= TO_DAYS(#{time2})
and account like concat('%',#{account},'%')
limit #{curPage},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from t_admin where 1=1
and TO_DAYS(time)>= TO_DAYS(#{time1})
and TO_DAYS(time)<= TO_DAYS(#{time2})
and account like concat('%',#{account},'%')
mapper.update: update t_admin set account=#{newname},roleid=#{newlevel} where account=#{oldname};
mapper.select: select id,name from t_params where type='worker'
